title: Filter chips: UX classes don't
code:
<gds-flex padding="xl" width="100%" justify-content="center" alig-items="center">
  <gds-filter-chips>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small" selected>Card purchase</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">Direct debit</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small">Pay to bankgiro or plusgiro</gds-filter-chip>
    <gds-filter-chip size="small" selected>Swish</gds-filter-chip>
  </gds-filter-chips>
</gds-flex>
